name: MDLTextureSampler
desc: An object that pairs a source of texture data with sampling parameters to be used in rendering the texture.

items.name: var texture: MDLTexture?
items.desc: The texture object that provides image data for sampling.

items.name: var hardwareFilter: MDLTextureFilter?
items.desc: An object that describes filtering modes for sampling from the texture.

items.name: var transform: MDLTransform?
items.desc: The transformation to be applied to texture coordinate data before sampling from the texture.
